name: Treasure Hunters (itch) (Eduard_AX)
description:
Treasure Hunters:

You can control two treasure hunters to collect gold and avoid being killed by deathly traps!

Hunter Molly:

Molly grew up in the underground, he is very familiar with caves and lavas and stuff.

Molly's ability is to crawl on walls, but be aware, he cannot hold on to the walls for ever!

Hunter Horsy:

Horsy hungers for gold and diamonds, he sweared to collect them all.

Horsy mastered the ability. to super jumps! He's legs are strong!

Controls:

Molly:

A-D to move.

W to jump.

Press 'SpaceBar' to start moving on walls (press again to release.

W-A-S-D to move on walls.

Horsy:

A-D to move.

W to jump.

Hold 'Return' to charge for super jump (longer you hold, further you will jump.
